  2. Meta rolls out internal AI tool as it pushes into business market  Financial Times
  3. Meta rolls out Metamate AI tool for employees; aims to create ‘world’s best enterprise assistant’  The Times of India
  4. Meta quietly leans on rival GPT-4 despite Zuckerberg’s bold Llama claims  InfoWorld
  5. Meta uses OpenAI’s GPT-4 alongside Llama to augment internal AI coding tool  Fortune

item.title: Meta debuts a tool for watermarking AI-generated videos - TechCrunch
item.description: Meta debuts a tool for watermarking AI-generated videos  TechCrunch
